VariableDescription.Name: B_vec_xyz_gse__C3_CP_FGM_SPIN
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Cluster C3, Magnetic Field Vector, spin resolution in GSE
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         Cluster
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Cluster
#     SOURCE_NAME                     C3>Cluster spacecraft 3
#     DESCRIPTOR                      FGM>FluxGate Magnetometer Spin Resolution
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  C3_CP_FGM_SPIN
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Cluster Spacecraft 3 FluxGate Magnetometer (FGM) Spin-Resolution Parameters
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 C3_CP_FGM_SPIN_00000000_v01
#     MISSION                         Cluster
#     PI_NAME                         Andre Balogh>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk & Elizabeth Lucek>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk                          
#                                      & ESA CAA                                                                                             
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  Imperial College
#     MISSION_TIME_SPAN               6.3133649e+13
#     MISSION_AGENCY                  ESA
#                                     The aim of the Cluster mission is to study small-scale structures of the magnetosphere                 
#                                     and its environment in three dimensions. To achieve this, Cluster is constituted                       
#                                      of four                                                                                               
#                                     identical spacecraft that will flight in a tetrahedral configuration. The separation                   
#                                      distances                                                                                             
#                                     between the spacecraft will be varied between 600 km and 20 000 km, according                          
#                                      to the                                                                                                
#                                     key scientific regions.
#     MISSION_KEY_PERSONNEL           Philippe Escoubet>Philippe.Escoubet@esa.int >Cluster Project Scientist
#     MISSION_REFERENCES              The Cluster and Phoenix Missions>Cluster project and instrument teams>Space                            
#                                      Sci. Rev. 79, Nos. 1-2, 1997                                                                          
#     MISSION_REGION                  Solar_Wind
#                                     Bow_Shock
#                                     Magnetosheath
#                                     Magnetopause
#                                     Magnetosphere
#                                     Magnetotail
#                                     Polar_Cap
#                                     Auroral_Region
#                                     Cusp
#                                     Radiation_Belt
#                                     Plasmasphere
#     MISSION_CAVEATS                 *CL
#     OBSERVATORY                     Cluster-1
#     OBSERVATORY_CAVEATS             *C3_CQ
#     OBSERVATORY_DESCRIPTION         Cluster-1 (Rumba)
#                                     Launched: 09 Aug 2000
#                                     ESA Number: 1
#                                     COSPAR ID: 2000-045A
#                                     USSPACECOM catalogue number 26463
#                                     CSDS Code: C3
#                                     ESOC FD code: S1
#                                     ESA Flight Model Number: FM5
#     OBSERVATORY_TIME_SPAN           6.3130970e+13
#     OBSERVATORY_REGION              Solar_Wind
#                                     Bow_Shock
#                                     Magnetosheath
#                                     Magnetopause
#                                     Magnetosphere
#                                     Magnetotail
#                                     Polar_Cap
#                                     Auroral_Region
#                                     Cusp
#                                     Radiation_Belt
#                                     Plasmasphere
#     EXPERIMENT                      FGM
#     EXPERIMENT_DESCRIPTION          Fluxgate Magnetometer
#     INVESTIGATOR_COORDINATES        Andre Balogh>PI>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk
#                                     Elizabeth Lucek>PI>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk
#     EXPERIMENT_REFERENCES           *CL_CD_CAA_FGM_ICD_0001_V0_1.pdf
#                                     *CL_CD_FGM_USERMAN.pdf
#                                     http://www.sp.ph.ic.ac.uk/Cluster/
#     EXPERIMENT_KEY_PERSONNEL        Andre Balogh>PI>a.balogh@imperial.ac.uk
#                                     Elizabeth Lucek>PI>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk
#     EXPERIMENT_CAVEATS              *CL_CQ_FGM_CAVF.txt
#     MEASUREMENT_TYPE                Magnetic_Field
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Please acknowledge the FGM team and ESA Cluster Active
#                                     Archive in any publication based upon use of this data.
#     INSTRUMENT_NAME                 FGM1
#     INSTRUMENT_DESCRIPTION          FGM Experiment on Cluster C3
#     INSTRUMENT_CAVEATS              *C3_CQ_FGM_CAVF
#     DATASET_ID                      C3_CP_FGM_SPIN
#     DATA_TYPE                       CP>CAA Parameter
#     DATASET_TITLE                   Magnetic field, spin resolution
#     DATASET_DESCRIPTION             This dataset contains spin resolution measurements of the magnetic field vector                        
#                                      from the FGM                                                                                          
#                                     experiment on the Cluster C3 spacecraft
#     CONTACT_COORDINATES             Elizabeth Lucek>PI>e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 4
#     MIN_TIME_RESOLUTION             4.412
#     MAX_TIME_RESOLUTION             3.636
#     PROCESSING_LEVEL                Calibrated
#     DATASET_CAVEATS                 *C3_CQ_FGM_CAVF
#     FILE_TYPE                       cef
#     METADATA_TYPE                   CAA
#     LINK_TEXT                       Higher-Resolution FGM and other instrument parameters from the
#                                     Cluster Magnetometer
#     LINK_TITLE                      Cluster Science Archive
#                                     Instrument Home Page
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/csa
#                                     http://www3.imperial.ac.uk/spat/research/missions/space_missions/clusterhomepage/clustermagnetometerins
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Cluster-Samba/FGM/SpinResolution/4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Interval centred time tag
#  2. Cluster C3, Magnetic Field Vector, spin resolution in GSE
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 17:58:47 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
UT                                      BX_GSE                 BY_GSE                 BZ_GSE
                                   (@_Bx GSE_)            (@_By GSE_)            (@_Bz GSE_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                      nT                     nT                     nT
30-01-2001 21:37:18.537                212.096                1.31200               -272.038
